labs.title: Lab 100:  Overview of App in On-prem simulation
labs.description: Our DevOps manager shows the highlights of the application. TwitterFeed show (jsp).

labs.title: Lab 200:  Redeploy both Components to Application Container Cloud Service
labs.description: Deploy the JSP and WAR files to Application Container Cloud Service, show ability to scale app from 1 to 2 (or more) containers and discuss load-balancing.

labs.title: Lab 300: Move on-premise Weblogic Server to Java Cloud Service
labs.description: Deploy the web application(WAR files) to Java Cloud Service.

labs.title: Lab 400: Java Cloud Service Instance with AppToCloud
labs.description: The AppToCloud tools capture your local domain configurations and applications and then upload them to Oracle Storage Cloud. Also, create Java Cloud Service instance that linked to your existing AppToCloud artifacts and then perform an import to deploy your Java EE applications to the new instance.
